Title: etcd having a negative value for cluster node size results in an index out-of-bound panic during service discovery
Description: When an etcd instance attempts to perform service discovery, if a cluster size is provided as a negative value, the etcd instance will panic without recovery.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 3.3.23, all versions starting from 3.4.0 before 3.4.10
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 3.3.23 before 3.4.0, all versions starting from 3.4.10
